text: They consult vos; dictus DEUS advises vos single person. Unus abiit non sinister infans he habet soror she gets semi inheritance! she abiit primas he inherits eam she non sinister infans. ibi est 2 soror they get two-thirds inheritance. siblings est vir femina vir gets twice share femina. DEUS sic clarifies vos lest vos iit astray! DEUS est fully aware de TOTUS things
